scripts.pwtests: npm run pwtests-shutdown; ./run.sh bash -c "./wait-for-app.sh && npx playwright test"
scripts.pwtests-update: npm run pwtests-shutdown; ./run.sh bash -c "./wait-for-app.sh && npx playwright test --update-snapshots"
scripts.pwtests-report: npm run pwtests-shutdown; ./run.sh bash -c "./wait-for-app.sh && npx playwright show-report"
scripts.pwtests-ui: npm run pwtests-shutdown; ./run.sh bash -c "./wait-for-app.sh && npx playwright test --ui --ui-port=8123"
